titles.title: I Am Trusting Thee, Lord Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus! Trusting only Thee! Trusting Thee for full salvation, Great and free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus! At Thy feet I bow, For Thy grace and tender mercy, Trusting now!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I am trusting Thee to guide me: Thou alone shalt lead, Ev'ry day and hour supplying All my need.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I am trusting Thee, Lord Jesus! Never let me fall! I am trusting Thee forever, And for all.
